item.title: Boeing Stock Gains After CFO Projects Positive Free Cash Flow, Higher Deliveries Next Year
item.description: The planemaker expects positive free cash flow to reach low single digits next year.

item.title: Strategy Owns More Than 3% Of All Bitcoin – So Why Did It Raise $1.44 Billion In Cash?
item.description: Strategy Inc. has a $1.44B cash reserve to cover nearly two years of dividends and interest without touching its vast Bitcoin stockpile.

item.title: Michael Burry Denies Reports That Said He Was Short Tesla
item.description: “The Big Short” legend issued the clarification in a post on X, stating that his older short bet against Tesla was worth $5 million, not $500 million.
